Package cafe

Class Coffee

java.lang.Object
cafe.MenuItem
cafe.Coffee
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
public class Coffee
extends MenuItem
implements Customizable
This class extends the MenuItem class and implements customizable. It includes specific data and operations pertaining to a coffee object
